notesStmt.note: The ketubbah formulary is almost unused; only the groom's name was filled in.
The name of the city is not included; a note in pencil at the top attributes the document to Poona.

msContents.textLang: Imperial Aramaic (700-300 BCE), Official Aramaic (700-300 BCE); Hebrew
